function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate UV intensity due to lack of maintenance and degradation of UV bulbs.","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness in controlling contagious diseases and increased risk of disease propagation.","Mitigation":"Implement a proactive maintenance program for regular bulb replacement and adhere to manufacturer's recommendations.","Technologies":"UV intensity monitoring systems, automated bulb replacement systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff in indoor environments.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Unclear guidelines for upper-room UV installation and maintenance, leading to ineffective use.","Impact":"Inefficient utilization of UV fixtures and ineffective containment of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Develop clear guidelines for installation and maintenance, conduct operational research to assess limitations, and provide training for proper use.","Technologies":"UV installation and maintenance protocols, research and development for improved UV fixtures.","People":"Public health authorities, facility management, and building maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and facility management."},{"Description":"Dependence on expensive UV fixtures and bulbs, limiting accessibility in resource-limited settings.","Impact":"Inability to deploy UV fixtures for disease control in resource-limited settings, hindering disease containment efforts.","Mitigation":"Develop lower-cost UV fixtures and bulbs suitable for resource-limited settings, explore cost-effective UV technologies.","Technologies":"Research and development for affordable UV fixtures and bulbs, cost-effective UV technologies.","People":"Healthcare workers, public health organizations, and communities in resource-limited settings.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Dependence on natural convection currents for effective UV light efficacy, which may not be sufficient in all environments.","Impact":"Inadequate disinfection of airborne pathogens and reduced effectiveness in controlling disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Augment convection currents with mechanical ventilation systems or inexpensive mixing fans.","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, affordable mixing fans.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff in indoor environments.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, public health authorities."}]}
